page.title: 05Housing on Hunshelf.
page.content: For a rural area,Hunshelf is fairly densely settled.The settlements consist of hamlets and isolated buildings. Most of the houses are old.They are mainly built of stone;some newer ones are brick.They are on the whole quite large,and are nearly all detached,although semi-detached and terraced houses can also be found. A typical feature is the scattering over the whole area of isolated farmhouses and out-buildings.These are quite close together, reflecting the small average size of the farms and the productive land.
